thread.title: Britain leads International Emmys with 7 nominations
thread.title_full: Britain leads International Emmys with 7 nominations

author: CHARLES J. GANS
title: Britain leads International Emmys with 7 nominations
text:
Joel Ryan Britain leads International Emmys with 7 nominations 
FILE - In a May 10, 2015 file photo, Sheridan Smith poses for photographers upon arrival at the BAFTA Television awards in central London. Smith was nominated as best actress Monday, Sept. 5, 2015, in the International Emmys for her role in "Cilla" about the rise to fame of British pop singer and TV personality Cilla Black. (Photo by Joel Ryan/Invision/AP, File) Jon Furniss Britain leads International Emmys with 7 nominations 
FILE - In a Thursday, Jan. 24, 2013 file photo, Rafe Spall is seen at the European premiere of I Give It A Year at the Vue West End in London, UK. Spall was nominated as best actor Monday, Sept. 5, 2015, in the International Emmys for his role opposite Jon Hamm in the techno-thriller "White Christmas," the holiday special of the anthology series "Black Mirror." (Photo by Jon Furniss/Invision/AP, File) Posted: Monday, October 5, 2015 7:48 am | Updated: 9:00 am, Mon Oct 5, 2015. Britain leads International Emmys with 7 nominations Associated Press | 
NEW YORK (AP) â€” Britain has garnered a leading seven International Emmy nominations, including best actress and actor nods for Sheridan Smith and Rafe Spall. 
Smith is nominated for her role in "Cilla" about the rise to fame of British pop singer and TV personality Cilla Black, who died in August in Spain. Subscription Required An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety. You
